title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The filter should work without errors.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Add a table with a filter.
3. Set the filter value to new Date('3/2/2005').
4. Save and preview the report.
5. Observe the error message: There are error(s) in Table : table8
   - Error0 : data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))
   - Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Cannot convert it to Date. Cannot convert it to Date.
